segments.text: The band is pretty good . How do you like the music ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's very nice . I haven't heard live music in a while . This is fun .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , then , may I invite you for the next dance ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . But I'm afraid I'm not much of a dancer ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't worry . I'm not much of a dancer myself .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When did you learn to dance ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In college . But I don't dance very often . What's your favourite dance ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's hard to say . It depends . But I love the waltz .
segments.speaker: S2
